Review Date: 2014/02/26

Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
Product Description: ['Michael Keaton heads an all-star cast in this wild and crazy comedy about four mental patients who get separated from their therapist on the way to a baseball game. Billy (Keaton), a pathological liar with a violent streak, finds himself on the loose in New York City with his fellow group therapy patients: Henry (Christopher Lloyd), a neat freak; Jack (Peter Boyle), a former advertising executive who thinks he\'s Christ; and Albert (Stephen Furst), a near catatonic couch potato. Faced with the task of rescuing their missing doctor from a pair of crooked cops, the group finds themselves sharing a series of hilarious misadventures in this farce The Washington Post calls an "irresistibly nutty buddy movie."Bonus Content:', 'Theatrial Trailer', 'Theatrial Trailer', 'Recommendations', 'Recommendations']
Average Rating: 4.7

Knight', 'Studio': 'Studio Distribution Services', 'Writers': 'Jon Connolly, David Loucka', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: We watched this movie on VHS with a friend and we had to purchase it.  We updated our equipment and purchased it on DVD.  This is one of my favorite movies and we wanted to keep it long term.  From time to time, we share it with our friends if they have never seen it.  Many quotes in the movie have become part of our daily conversation.  Great movie!
Review Title: One of the funniest movies ever!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ken Davis: Fully Alive
Review Date: 2016/02/28
Store: Ken Davis  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
Product Description: ['We are born to live FULLY ALIVE! ...yet at times we may feel like people who lead lives of quiet desperation. Somewhere along the way, all the passion that once burned in our souls has been smothered. It is about time we rekindled that flame!!', "With his trademark humor and powerful stories, Ken Davis shares about his personal journey, all the way from lethargic resignation, to a new life of adventure, spiritual renewal, eternal joy, and perfect health... or as Jesus might have put it, living life to its fullest. We are shown the very first snapshot that started it all, we share hours of terror that changed Ken s life forever and then meet this living fossil on his bicycle! Not only that: we ll also laugh and be inspired to live in the extraordinary power of Christ's Resurrection!!", 'KEN DAVIS shares, This is the story of how I found my way back to the path of living Fully Alive, after years of wandering. I m not a stranger; I m not an expert; I m a fellow traveler; and I do fall down a lot. At age 65, KEN DAVIS is living FULLY ALIVE!']
Average Rating: 4.7

Review Title: Entertaining Video that Changed our Outlook on Life
Rating: 5.0

Review Text: This is a very entertaining film with some sexual undertones that would be natural for two men discussing life while on a hiking trip.  I would watch it again.  My recommendations for this film would include a warning about the course language and sexual innuendos. The actors did a wonderful job depicting men who are aging and their defiance of the inevitable seen by their decision to walk the Appalachian Trail.  The movie is funny. My husband and I watched it twice.
Review Title: Funny and Entertaining especially for older adults.  Some Course language.

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analyzed purchase history reveals a strong preference for comedy and motivational genres within film and TV. Consistent high ratings, averaging above 4.5, indicate a favorable sentiment towards entertaining and humorous content, with specific interest in movies and shows that foster engagement and social sharing with friends and family.

Notable themes center around light-hearted comedies and inspirational narratives, suggesting an inclination towards uplifting content that fosters conversation and reflection. The individual enjoys movies that offer comedic relief as well as those that provide motivational insights, indicating that they value both entertainment and personal growth.

Quality preferences lean towards high production values and notable acting performances, while they demonstrate moderate price sensitivity, as purchasing decisions seem to favor well-rated titles rather than budget options.

Additionally, there is a clear aversion to overly graphic content; the individual has expressed discomfort with gratuitous sexual scenes and strong language, indicating a preference for content that maintains a level of appropriateness. This pattern of selection highlights a desire for engaging storylines while ensuring a comfortable viewing experience.

Overall, this individual's core preferences reflect an appreciation for well-crafted comedy and inspiring content, favoring films and series that balance entertainment with emotional or intellectual engagement while steering clear of excessive graphic material.

target_interaction.title: Love the movie!
target_interaction.text: Although this movie didn't get the best of ratings, we loved it.  It had redemptive value to it.
